game.name: Synth Laser
game.shortDescription: Synth Laser is a dynamic laser maze rhythm game. Get ready to dodge and weave around the deadly and stunning laser show, built upon the outrun and synthwave music.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Synth Laser is a dynamic laser maze rhythm game. Get ready to dodge and weave around the deadly and stunning laser show, built upon the outrun and synthwave music.
